V_EHI_CLM_FILTER_STATIC.name: V_EHI_CLM_FILTER_STATIC
V_EHI_CLM_FILTER_STATIC.description: This view supports extracting rich text format (RTF) data for EHI from the claim information masterfile.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the claim or claim information record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The patient or member associated with the claim or claim information record.
